name: Mark Hazleton
introduction: Hi, my name is Mark Hazleton and I specialize in building scalable cloud-based solutions and full-stack development, with a passion for helping businesses improve their web presence.
about: Mark Hazleton is a Solution Architect and full-stack developer with over 15 years of experience. He is the founder of Project Mechanics, a consulting business that helps companies optimize their web presence. With deep expertise in .NET, cloud architecture (Azure, AWS), and modern frontend frameworks, Mark focuses on building robust, scalable applications. His work spans various industries, providing tailored technical solutions to drive business success. He shares his knowledge through articles and projects at MarkHazleton.com.
